elements.name: preamble_header_and_text
elements.html:
{workshop_course} for Returning Teachers Post-Workshop Survey

Well done, you've completed a Code.org {workshop_course} Professional Development workshop!

This survey asks questions about your experience. Your feedback is crucial to ensuring we best serve educators through continual program improvement.

Privacy and Confidentiality

  • Your individual responses here are completely confidential.
  • Your identity will never be revealed publicly or used to tie any responses back to you personally.
  • We may share de-identified, aggregate data (representing all responses) publicly.
  • Your de-identified responses will be used by Code.org, our Regional Partners, and our facilitators for program improvement.

elements.name: overall_success
elements.title: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about the workshop overall?

rows.text: I feel more prepared to teach the material covered in this workshop than before I came.
I know where to go if I need help preparing to teach this material.
This professional development was suitable for my level of experience with teaching CS.
I would recommend this professional development to others.
I feel connected to a community of computer science teachers.

elements.name: teacher_engagement
elements.title: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about your level of engagement in the workshop?

rows.text: I found the activities we did in this workshop interesting and engaging.
I was highly active and participated a lot in the workshop activities.
I am definitely planning to make use of ideas and content covered in this workshop in my classroom.

elements.name: supported_learning_FR
elements.title: What supported your learning the most and why?

elements.name: detracted_learning_FR
elements.title: What detracted from your learning and why?

elements.name: curriculum_impressions
elements.title: Having attended the workshop, what are your overall impressions of the {workshop_course} curriculum?

rows.text: I am going to love teaching with this curriculum.
I intend to use the lesson plans provided in this curriculum.
I can explain to a fellow teacher what EIPM means and how it is applied in the new {workshop_course} curriculum.
I am leaving this workshop with a good understanding of how to use the tools and technologies in this course.

elements.name: most_excited_20_21_FR
elements.title: As you have previously taught Code.org's {workshop_course} curriculum, which aspects of the 2020-21 course are you most excited about?

elements.name: concerned_20_21_FR
elements.title: As you have previously taught Code.org's {workshop_course} curriculum, which aspects of the 2020-21 course are you most concerned or confused about?

elements.name: logistics_feedback_FR
elements.title: Do you have feedback about the way logistics were run for this workshop? Please be specific and provide suggestions for improvement.

elements.name: other_feedback_FR
elements.title: Is there anything else youâ€™d like to tell us about your experience at this workshop?

elements.name: facilitator_feedback_title
elements.html:
Facilitator Feedback

Next, please share feedback related to your {workshop_course} facilitator(s). This feedback is informative for facilitators as they plan for future workshops.

templateElements.name: facilitator_effectiveness
templateElements.title: During my workshop, {panel.facilitator_name} did the following:

rows.text: Built and sustained an equitable learning environment in our workshop.
Kept the workshop and participants on track.
Helped me see ways to create and support an equitable learning environment for my students.
Demonstrated a healthy working relationship with their co-facilitator (if applicable).

templateElements.name: facilitator_did_well_fr
templateElements.title: What were two things {panel.facilitator_name} did well?

templateElements.name: facilitator_could_improve_fr
templateElements.title: What were two things {panel.facilitator_name} could do better?

elements.name: wrap_up_title
elements.html:
Wrapping Up

Lastly, we would like to know if we can quote your feedback and stay in touch with you.

elements.name: permission_to_quote
elements.title: I give the workshop organizer permission to quote my written comments from today for use on social media, promotional materials, and other communications.

choices.text: Yes, I give the workshop organizer permission to quote me and use my name.
Yes, I give the workshop organizer permission to quote me, but I want to be anonymous.
No, I do not give the workshop organizer my permission.

elements.name: willing_talk
elements.title: Occasionally, Code.org follows-up with workshop participants to get more insight into their experience and learn how we can continue to improve our programs and products. Would you be willing to talk with Code.org?

elements.name: thank_you_header
elements.html:
Thanks from Code.org for your time, commitment and passion for teaching {workshop_course} this year.

You are making a difference for your students. We're looking forward to what's next. Onward!
